text: Be-shak woh log kafir hogaye jin ka qol hai kay maseeh ibn-e-marium hi Allah hain halankay khud maseeh ney unn say kaha tha aey bani israeel! Allah hi ki ibadat kero jo mera aur tumhara sab ka rab hai yaqeen mano kay jo shaks Allah kay sath shareek kerta hai Allah Taalaa ney uss per jannat haram ker di hai uss ka thikana jahannum hi hai aur gunehgaron ki madad kerney wala koi nahi hoga
